ComicInfo.Summary: *Overview* Hulk plays a fighting virtual reality game with Atalanta, were they fight opponents like Doomsday, Silver Surfer, The Thing, Wolverine, and Venom.Suddenly, the Mount is attacked by Trauma and his men. Despise the resistance of the Hulk and the Pantheon, Trauma manages to kidnap Atalanta. Meanwhile, Cassiopeia returns to the Pantheon, and Marlo Chandler stars to send her invitations to her wedding with Rick Jones.
